card.name: Prisoner’s Dilemma
card.text: You and target opponent look at and then exile the top card of your libraries, face down. Declare its type, then reveal the exiled cards. If both players told the truth, both players scry 1 and then draw a card. If one player lied, that player draws a card. The other player discards a card. If both players lied, they both discard a card. Then each player puts the exiled card on the bottom of his or her library Exile this card.

card.name: BATNA
card.text: You may remove an attacking creature you control from combat. If you do, untap that creature.

card.name: Brandolini’s Law
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 3.

card.name: Cool Off the Mark
card.text: Target creature does not untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.text: Take control of target land. Tap it. It does not untap on your next untap step.

card.text: Creatures you control have Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Overton Window
card.text: Overton Window comes into play with 5 counters. Only spells with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of counters on Overton Window may be played. 1: Add a counter to Overton Window 1: Remove a counter from Overton Window.

card.text: Indestructible Landfall—Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Creature spells you control cannot be countered.

card.text: Target creature gains +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.text: Vigilance, reach

card.name: Shit Umbrella
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature gains +0/+4. Damage that would be done to other creatures you control is instead dealt to equipped creature.

card.name: Sousveillance
card.text: Creatures your opponents control cannot attack this turn.

card.name: Three-Body Problem
card.text: At most one creature may attack and one defend. Other declared attackers remain tapped but do not deal combat damage.

card.name: Trans-Pacific Parternship
card.text: Untap creatures you control. They gain +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: True Believer
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice True Believer unless you pay 1W.

card.name: Waiting for Godot
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gains Clueless (This creature cannot attack or block.)

card.name: @hewhocutsdown
card.text: +1: Draw two cards, then discard a card. -1: Return exiled card you control to your hand. -8: Exile the top six cards from any library. You may play any number of cards exiled this way without paying their mana cost.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud.

card.name: Alfred Thayer Mahan

card.text: 2UT: Other blue creatures you control have hexproof and indestructible.

card.name: Augmented Reality
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/2 Artifact Creature. It is still a land.

card.name: Backchannel
card.text: Search your graveyard for a card and put it on the top of your library.

card.name: Bruce Schneier
card.text: Shroud When Bruce Schneier enters the battlefield, scry 2 (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library in any order and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Chandler’s Law
card.text: Select a permanent you control. Search your library for copies of this card. You may put up to three copies in your hand.

card.name: Diplomacy
card.text: Bid 1 for target land (All players put their hands aside and draw one card. Each player selects a nonland card from those drawn, and puts that card face down. All players then reveal their bids, and place cards from their library into their graveyard equal to the converted mana cost of his or her revealed card. The highest revealed converted mana cost wins the bid. In the event of a tie, no winner is declared. All players shuffle cards drawn for the bid back into their libraries.)

card.name: Extended Cognition
card.text: Enchanted creature gets +0/+X where X is the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Futurist
card.text: 1UT: Scry 1 (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Ideological Turing Test
card.text: Target permanent becomes a copy of another target permanent until end of turn.

card.name: King Canute
card.text: Flash, defender When King Canute comes into play, exile target permanent. At the beginning of your end step, return exiled permanent to the battlefield.

card.name: Lies to Children
card.text: Scry 1 (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.) You may draw one card. If you do so, return a permanent you control to your library. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Lisp Variant
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile the top card of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library at random.) Draw three cards. Discard a card.

card.text: Target permanent becomes a copy of another target permanent until end of turn.

card.text: Discard a card. Draw a card.

card.text: At the beginning of your untap step, if you have no tapped land, lands you control produce an additional red mana until end of turn.

card.text: Deal 3 damage to target creature or player. You may cast Race Condition only if another spell is on the stack.

At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, he or she must tap a land they control for each creature named Refugees you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Refugees unless you pay 1.

card.name: Jacques Ellul

card.text: At beginning of your end step, if all your permanents are untapped, you may play a card of converted mana cost equal to or less than the number of permanents you control from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Reparations
card.text: Put +1/+1 counters on a creature you control equal to the converted mana cost of a creature in your graveyard.

card.name: Surge Pricing
card.text: All spells cost an additional 2 this turn.

card.name: Swarm

card.text: Spells with two or more colors in their mana cost may be cast as if they were colorless.

card.name: Status Churn

card.name: Bayesian Cultist
card.text: T: Look at the top card of your library, and exile it. At the beginning of your opponent’s upkeep, you may pay 2. If you do, if that opponent plays a card of the same type as a card exiled by Cult of Bayes, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Episteme
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you do not control.

card.text: Creatures you control have 1T: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature that does not share a color with this creature.

card.text: On your upkeep, all players sacrifice a permanent. Place a +1/+1 counter on Paperclip Maximizer for each permanent sacrificed this way.

card.name: Phatic Speech
card.text: Green or white creatures gain +1/+1 when blocking nongreen and nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Anders Brevik

card.name: Normal Accidents
card.text: Enchant land At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted land’s controller rolls a twenty-sided dice. If he or she rolls a one, Normal Accidents destroys enchanted land and deals 7 damage to enchanted land’s owner. He or she must tap all lands he or she controls.

card.name: Powers and Principalities
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

card.name: RAHS
card.text: On your upkeep, scry 1 from target opponent’s library. (To scry 1, look at the top card of target library, then you may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

card.name: Solutionism
card.text: Players with more than 15 life lose 5 life; players with less than 15 life gain 5 life.

card.name: Status Panic
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/-1 when blocking creatures that do not share a color.

card.name: Bad Data

card.name: Dead Cow

card.name: Eris
card.text: Indestructible 2T: Bid 5 for target permanent (All players put their hands aside and draw five cards. Each player selects a nonland card from those drawn, and puts that card face down. All players then reveal their bids, and place cards from their library into their graveyard equal to the converted mana cost of his or her revealed card. The highest revealed converted mana cost wins the bid. In the event of a tie, no winner is declared. All players shuffle cards drawn for the bid back into their libraries.)

card.name: Eventually Consistent
card.text: Enchant player Enchanted player does not draw a card during his or her draw step. At the beginning of enchanted player’s end step, he or she draws a card.

card.name: Methodological Anarchy
card.text: Search your library for up to three cards. Shuffle your library, and shuffle the cards you searched for with the top five cards, and place them on top of your library. Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Worse Is Better
card.text: You may put a creature card of converted mana cost 3 or less on the battlefield without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Zemblanity

card.name: Carrying Capacity

card.name: Digital Shaman

card.name: Gish Gallop

card.name: Moloch
card.text: Sacrifice a creature, T: Put +1/+1 counters equal to that creature’s power on target creature.

card.name: Moral Arbitrage
card.text: Permanents of colors your opponents do not control cost one colored mana of your choice less to play.

card.name: Peak Oil
card.text: Target player removes all lands from his or her library and puts half of them, rounded up, into his or her graveyard. They shuffle the rest back into their library.

card.name: SARS
card.text: On your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. 2BGT: Remove a -1/-1 from target creature. Destroy that creature.

card.name: Tenth Lament
card.text: Sacrifice target permanent you control. Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Conway’s Law
card.text: Creatures you control of power 3 or less have T: Deal 1 damage to target creature. Creatures you control of power 4 or greater have T: Target creature gains +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Koan
card.text: Opponents cannot play spells this turn.

card.name: Mansplain
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: You may play two lands on your turn. On your upkeep, sacrifice a permanent.

card.name: Glycon
card.text: If combat damage is dealt to Glycon, sacrifice it. Discard a card: Glycon becomes unblockable until end of turn.

card.name: Hawala
card.text: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature you control to another target creature you control.

card.name: Jeffrey Sachs
card.text: 1GT: Regenerate target creature (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.) Cycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: System D
card.text: Search your library for a nonland card and reveal it. Put it in your hand, and return a card from your hand to your library. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Tree of Life

card.name: Cybersyn
card.text: Cards in your hand have Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Dead Media
card.text: Interchangeable (Whenever another permanent you control with converted mana cost equal to or less than this card would be put in the graveyard, you may sacrifice this card instead.)

card.name: Dunbar’s Number
card.text: Dunbar’s Number comes into play with 3 counters on it. On their end step, each player must control a number of creatures equal to or less than the number of counters on Dunbar’s number. Creatures may be sacrificed to meet this requirement. 3: Add a counter to Dunbar’s Number

card.name: F-35
card.text: Artifacts your opponents play cost double.

card.name: Flag of Convenience

card.name: Housing for the Homeless
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control more nontoken creatures than land you may search your library for a land and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Inukshuk
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Inukshuk unless you pay 1.

card.name: Iron Triangle

card.name: Ship of Theseus
card.text: T: Put a plank counter on Ship of Theseus T: Remove X plank counters from Ship of Theseus. Sacrifice Ship of Theseus. Put a token that is a copy of target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X onto the battlefield under your control.
